_comment: Behavior Chips: 操作機序そのものが装備。3カテゴリ×3+選択肢。

chips.name: Kite
chips.description: Keep distance from nearest enemy. Retreat when they get close.

chips.name: Orbit
chips.description: Circle around the nearest enemy group at a fixed distance.

chips.name: Greedy
chips.description: Prioritize moving toward drops and pickups.

chips.name: Highest HP
chips.description: Focus fire on the enemy with the most health.

chips.name: Cluster
chips.description: Target the densest group of enemies for maximum splash value.

chips.name: Auto Cast
chips.description: Fire as soon as cooldown is ready. Simple and reliable.

chips.name: On Kill
chips.description: Fire only after killing an enemy. Chains feel amazing.

chips.name: Panic
chips.description: Fire rapidly when HP drops below 30%. Desperation mode.
